instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 (missing PLT_RESET_L)  quick 200mA S0 bounce.
threads.message:
no evidence of water damage on this board.   Quick S0 bounce pulling 200mA for 1/4th a second.
The only thing I have found is a missing PLT_RESET_L signal.  Should be 3.3v prevent SMC_RESET but the 3.3v never shows.  It comes out of the mystery box U500.

Not sure what to check from this point.

threads.title: 820-00165 (missing PLT_RESET_L)  quick 200mA S0 bounce.
threads.message:
Any pulse at VCORE?
Platform reset is not released untill power on sequence is completed.

threads.title: 820-00165 (missing PLT_RESET_L)  quick 200mA S0 bounce.
threads.message:
All the CPU rails come up during the S0 state,
all the 3v3 switches come on and operate normally. Even the .9v switch.
I can't see anything wrong with any of the rails.  Resistance is all good.

threads.title: 820-00165 (missing PLT_RESET_L)  quick 200mA S0 bounce.
threads.message:
Did you try new BIOS?

"It comes out of the mystery box U500."
Who?
PLT_RESET_L is controlled by PCH...

threads.title: 820-00165 (missing PLT_RESET_L)  quick 200mA S0 bounce.
threads.message:
CPU , PCH. Same U500 mystery box. 
I have not tried another bios.  but I will..
